citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The facility did not have an unaffiliated member from the end of August 2022 through October 2022. During this time, one
IACUC meeting was held and the September 2022 semi-annual reviews were conducted. No protocols were approved
during this time. The facility obtained a new unaffiliated member in November 2022.
The lack of participation of an unaffiliated IACUC member in IACUC meetings and semi-annuals means that there is a
lack of general community interest being represented on the committee regarding proper care and treatment of animals at
the facility. The IACUC, when conducting business required under the Animal Welfare Act, shall include at least one
member unaffiliated with the facility.
To be corrected by June 16, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
